articles.author: Zenia D'cunha
articles.title: Rohan Bopanna in first Australian Open final, reaching his peak at 43 - ESPN India
articles.description: At 43, Rohan Bopanna has a chance to win his first-ever men's doubles Grand Slam title.
articles.content:
You see Rohan Bopanna on a tennis court and you can tell why there's always talk of age associated with his achievements.
There's a lot of grey in his beard, there's a slight stoop and heft to a phy… [+5547 chars]

articles.author: Liz Kruesi
articles.title: The lost continent of Zealandia has been mapped for the first time - National Geographic
articles.description: This enormous chunk of submerged continental crust sits between Antarctica and Australia, where it connected the landmasses as part of a supercontinent some 300 million years ago.
articles.content: After years of exploration and research, scientists have finished mapping a sunken continent that lurks beneath the South Pacific. This chunk of continental crust, driven to the depths millions of ye… [+6660 chars]

articles.title: World-first mass malaria vaccine rollout starts in Cameroon | The World - ABC News (Australia)
articles.description: Cameroon is rolling out a vaccine for malaria – which kills nearly half a million children under five in Africa every year.  But health workers say demand is...
